content: crochet photography mittens written by carmen jacob 2016 notes uses approx 6oz of i love this yarn brand solid acrylic yarn directions are for women s size m waistcoat technique to obtain the knit-like stockinette appearance pictured all scs are made into the verticals the v of the stitch below this is called waistcoat or split single_crochet if you use traditional single_crochet the finished project will probably be a bit larger & more loose fitting waistcoat stitch also tends to lean slightly as you may notice in the photos blocking your mittens will minimize this appearance abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch s = slip_stitch yo = yarn over decrease= single_crochet two stitches together cuff make 2 using 3 75mm hook cuff is 26 row of slip_stitch ribbing row 1 chain 11 working in front loops only yo to create 3rd loop for your slip stitches & slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across chain 1 turn repeat row 1 for a total of 26 row whipstitch or slip-stitch closed and turn right-side out make sure there are 13 braid columns on the right side cut yarn and flip so that the braids are pointing downward see photo right hand switch to 5mm hook for body left hand instructions are at the bottom of this pattern round 1 re-attach your yarn and working along row ends of cuff make 2scs into each end of the outer braid of your cuff ribbing for a total of 26 stitches slip_stitch to close round 2 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-19 single_crochet in-between stitch 19 & 20 & place stitch marker this is where the increase is made for base of thumb single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 27 stitches round 3 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-19 2 scs into stitch 20 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 28 stitches round 4 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-20 single_crochet in-between stitch 20 & 21 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 29 stitches round 5 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-20 2 scs into stitch 21 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 30 stitches round 6 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-21 single_crochet in-between stitch 21 & 22 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 31 stitches round 7 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-21 2 scs into stitch 22 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 32 stitches 32 round 8 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-22 single_crochet in-between stitch 22 & 23 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 33 stitches round 9 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-22 2 scs into stitch 23 move stitch marker single_crochet in remaining stitches slip_stitch 34 stitches round 10 ch1 single_crochet into all stitches 34 creating thumb opening round 11 chain 1 single_crochet into stitches 1-19 skip 10 stitches single_crochet into remaining stitches slip_stitch 24 upper hand rounds 12-20 ch1 single_crochet into each stitch below slip_stitch 24 round 21 ch1 single_crochet into stitches 1-19 chain 3 and skip 3
